text: This “ Stranger Things ” fan will forever treasure her high school senior photos. In October, California student Damaris Fregoso cheekily asked actor David Harbour ― aka police chief Jim Hopper in Netflix ’ s sci - fi horror ― how many retweets she ’ d require for him to take part in the shoot :. @ DavidKHarbour how many retweets for you take my senior photos with me — damaris ( @ postydamaris ) October 29, 2017 Harbour spotted the 17 - year - old ’ s tweet and replied, but with some cheeky conditions of his own attached : 25k. And I get to wear the school sweatshirt and hold a trombone. https : / / t. co / xPNEE681J4 — David Harbour ( @
